Class EditEventDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • src.EditEventDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    public class EditEventDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    EditEventDialog is used to contains the title, time and button to delete and edit event of Event.

    This class contains:

    - An Event

    - A dialog of itself

    - A panel that opens this dialog

    - A start time of event

    - A end time of event

    Author:
    Sang Doan Tan 1370137
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  EditEventDialog.Btn
      Btn is used to contain the edit and delete button of Event.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.DateComboBoxRenderer
      DateComboBoxRenderer is used to render TimeComboBox to display ("HH::mm") format.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.DateLabelFormatter
      DateLabelFormatter is used to format day in JDateTimePicker.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.DateTime
      DateTime is used to contain all labels, text fields that relates to DateTime and TimeComboBox for editing event.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.Description
      Description is used to contain icon, label and text field of description of Event for editing Event.
      (package private) class  EditEventDialog.DisplayPanel
      DisplayPanel is used to contain the title and the time of Event.
      (package private) class  EditEventDialog.EditBtn
      EdiBtn is used to contain the button to save the change of editing Event to database.
      (package private) class  EditEventDialog.EventMainPanel
      EventMainPanel is used to contain EditEventDialog.DateTime panel, FiendField panel, EditEventDialog.LocationField panel, EditEventDialog.Description panel, EditEventDialog.Reminder panel and EditEventDialog.Priority panel for editing Event.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.FriendField
      FriendField is used to contains icon, text field, list of friends of the Event
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.LocationField
      LocationField is used to contains icon, label and text field of location of Event for editing Event.
      (package private) class  EditEventDialog.MainPanel
      MainPanel is used to contain all panels that needed to edit for Event
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.Priority
      Priority is used to contains a JComboBox for user to select the priority for editing Event.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.Reminder
      Reminder is used to contains a JComboBox for user to select remind options for editing Event.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.TimeComboBox
      TimeComboBox is used to contains the JComboBox to select the time of the Event for editing Event.
      (package private) static class  EditEventDialog.TitlePanel
      TitlePanel is used to contain the label and the text field of title for editing Event.
